central_thesis.text: Every AI system needs traceability. When you're building content generation pipelines, you want to ensure that every piece of output can be traced back to its source. This is what we call provenance tracking.

evidence_spans.text: The key insight here is that every AI system needs traceability. When you're building content generation pipelines, you want to ensure that every piece of output can be traced back to its source.

themes.summary: Key focus on AI pipeline architecture with operational detail on the 8-stage approach.

evidence_spans.text: Today we're diving deep into building auditable AI pipelines.

themes.summary: Key focus on auditability with evidence spans and provenance tracking.

evidence_spans.text: Each of these has evidence spans pointing back to the source chunks.

themes.summary: Key focus on content generation workflows and modular debugging.

evidence_spans.text: Finally, stage eight assembles everything into the final markdown output with full footnotes. The beauty of this approach is that you can debug any stage independently.

claims.claim_text: Every AI system needs traceability for reliable content generation

claims.claim_text: The 8-stage approach enables modular debugging of pipeline components

evidence_spans.text: The beauty of this approach is that you can debug any stage independently. If stage 4 is giving weird classifications, you can run just that stage with fixed inputs and iterate quickly.

claims.claim_text: Evidence spans allow output to be traced back to source chunks
